nl.fw.yapool

Interface IPoolListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IQueryCache
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LeaserAcquiredTrace, MaxUsageTracker, PoolEventLogger, PoolEventQueue, PoolListener, PoolPerformance, SimpleQueryCache

    public interface IPoolListener
extends EventListener
    Listener that can be added to a IPoolEvents registry to receive PoolEvents.
    Author:
    Fred

    • Method Detail

      • wantAllEventActions

        boolean wantAllEventActions()
        Returns:
        true if this pool listener wants to receive all pool events.

      • getWantEventActions

        Collection<String> getWantEventActions()
        Returns:
        collection of pool events that this pool listener wants to receive.

      • wantsEventAction

        boolean wantsEventAction(String poolEventAction)
        Returns:
        true if this pool listener wants to receive the given pool event type.
